sentences.en: A few hardy men broke the ice on the lake and had a swim.
sentences.cn: 几个硬汉打破了湖上的冰去游泳.

sentences.en: Father Mapple was in the hardy winter of a healthy old age.
sentences.cn: 梅普尔神甫正是处于岁寒不雕、老当益壮的时期.

sentences.en: Hardy antelope wander in from the desert.
sentences.cn: 适应力强的羚羊从沙漠游荡到了这里。

sentences.en: Hardy as a young man played the fiddle at local dances.
sentences.cn: 哈迪年轻时在当地舞会上演奏小提琴。

sentences.en: Hardy has often been criticised for an excessively pessimistic view of life.
sentences.cn: 哈代由于对生活持过度悲观的态度而常常受到批评。
能适应恶劣环境的石山羊

sentences.en: He was vigorous , hardy, intelligent and straightforward.
sentences.cn: 他有活力,能刻苦, 睿智而正直.

sentences.en: Louise won the disfavour of the two Hardy girls Mary and Harriet.
sentences.cn: 路易丝引起哈代家的姑娘玛丽与哈丽特的不满.

sentences.en: Only a hardy man should enter the auto race.
sentences.cn: 只有胆大的人才能参加摩托赛.

sentences.en: Roger Hardy of the BBC looks at this latest twist in the political crisis in Algeria.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司的罗杰·哈迪就阿尔及利亚政治危机的这一最新转机作出解析。

sentences.en: Sheep must be hardy to live on the hills in winter.
sentences.cn: 羊必须强壮,冬天才能在山上生活.

sentences.en: Some hardy spirits made jokes, helping others overcome their fear.
sentences.cn: 有些胆大的人插科打诨, 帮助别人消除害怕心里.

sentences.en: the comedy duo Laurel and Hardy
sentences.cn: 劳莱和哈代这对喜剧搭档

sentences.en: The kind of plant is a hardy annual.
sentences.cn: 这种植物是耐寒的一年生植物.

sentences.en: The silver-leaved varieties of cyclamen are not quite as hardy.
sentences.cn: 银叶仙客来品种不太耐寒。
